Room.Name: Women's Restroom
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the women's restroom of the Pits of Doom Arena.
Room.LongDescription: Large mirrors cover the walls, and bright lights surround them. Near the back of the room are several massage tables where an attendent masseuse waits. Comfortable furniture forms a sitting area by the door, and one wall has lockers avaiable for a price. A steaming spa sits in the center of the room.
